title: Project S
description:
Seung-ah, who works for the Cosmetics company, recently participated in the Hotel Amenity contest held at the Seojin Hotel as a team project but failed to make it out of the preliminaries.

Seung-ah and her co-workers who worked very hard in this contest came in an agreement to meet the officials of Seojin Hotel.

Somehow, when they found out that there was something between Seung-ah and Seo Jin-hyung, the successor of Seojin Hotel, during the time at their university,  they all counted on her.

In fact, Seung-ah confessed to Jin-hyung because she loved him unrequitedly in college, but she didn't like it because she had a painful memory of being dumped. But, she took the courage for the company and contacted him.

Of course, she thought she would be rejected, but Jin-hyung accepted the meeting and welcomed Seung-ah very warmly on the day they finally met.

Jin-hyung brought up the story of the Seojin Hotel contest and said, "Seung-ah, I fell for you!"

 Why would a handsome chaebol heir, who should have nothing to worry about, do this to me?!

Please look forward to Seung-ah's cheerful and lively cosmic romance!

[hr][b][u]Portuguese / Português[/u][/b]
[spoiler]
Seung-ah, que trabalha para a empresa de cosméticos, recentemente participou do concurso Hotel Amenity realizado no Seojin Hotel como um projeto de equipe, mas não conseguiu sair das preliminares.

Seung-ah e seus colegas de trabalho que trabalharam arduamente neste concurso chegaram a um acordo para encontrar os funcionários do Seojin Hotel.

De alguma forma, quando eles descobriram que havia algo entre Seung-ah e Seo Jin-hyung, o sucessor do Seojin Hotel, durante o tempo em sua universidade, todos eles contaram com ela.

Na verdade, Seung-ah confessou a Jin-hyung porque ela o amava sem ser correspondido na faculdade, mas ela não gostou porque tinha uma dolorosa memória de ter sido dispensada. Mas, ela tomou coragem para a empresa e entrou em contato com ele.

Claro, ela pensou que seria rejeitada, mas Jin-hyung aceitou o encontro e deu as boas-vindas a Seung-ah no dia em que finalmente se conheceram.

Jin-hyung trouxe à tona a história do concurso do Seojin Hotel e disse, "Seung-ah, eu me apaixonei por você!"

Por que um belo herdeiro chaebol, que não deveria ter nada com que se preocupar, faria isso comigo?!

Por favor, aguardem o romance cósmico alegre e animado de Seung-ah!
[/spoiler]

matches.title: Please Take Care of Me in This Life as Well
The Problem of My Love Affair
I Want to Do It, Even If It Hurts
The Villain Demands I Love Him
